name: Mireraband
textDefeated: Well done {{ character.name }}, I should have guessed you'd grown some.
textLost: As I thought, {{character.name}}, your skills are no match for my own!

name: Fie
textDefeated: Well done {{ character.name }}, you really know how to use your {{ weaponName }}.
textLost: You should have known you were no match for my {{ creatureWeaponName }}!

name: Glynyc
textDefeated: Aah, defeated by the likes of you!  Next thing you know, Mireraband will be hunting me down!
textLost: Haha, maybe you should go back to Mireraband's class.

name: Guth
textDefeated: Ha! Hahaha, excellent fight {{ character.name }}!  Haven't had a battle like that since I was in the RAF!
textLost: Back in the RAF, we'd have eaten the likes of you alive! Go work on your skills some old boy!

name: Un√©lith
textDefeated: Your mind is greater than mine. I concede defeat.
textLost: Your mental powers are lacking.  Meditate on this failure and perhaps some day you will defeat me.

name: Adwares
textDefeated: Ach!  Y' do hold yer {{ weaponName }} with skeel!
textLost: Har!  Y' do be needin moore praktise y' wee cub!

name: Ceiloth
textDefeated: Well done {{ character.name }}, I can see that great things lie in the future for you!
textLost: You are becoming powerful, but not yet that powerful.

name: Dwiredan
textDefeated: Perhaps I should have considered your {{ weaponName }}...
textLost: Perhaps you'll reconsider my twin swords before you try that again?

name: Sensei Noetha
textDefeated: Your style was superior, your form greater. I bow to you.
textLost: Learn to adapt your style, and you shall prevail.

name: Celith
textDefeated: Wow, how did you dodge all those halos?
textLost: Watch out for that last halo, it's coming back this way!

name: Gadriel the Elven Ranger
textDefeated: I can accept that you defeated me, because after all elves are immortal while you are not, so the victory will be mine.
textLost: Do not forget that elves are immortal. Mortals will likely never defeat one of the fey.

name: Adoawyr
textDefeated: If I could have picked up this sword, I probably would have done better!
textLost: Haha, I couldn\'t even pick the sword UP and I still won!

name: Yoresh
textDefeated: Well, you evaded my touch. I salute you!
textLost: Watch out for my touch next time!
